nodes.text: A spice freighter was any transport used to transport spice. Owen Lars lied to young Luke Skywalker, claiming Anakin Skywalker had been a spice freighter navigator. This did hold a kernel of truth, as Anakin had navigated the Twilight, a spice freighter, a number of times during the Clone Wars. Before joining the Rebel Alliance, Mishowan Shigormallan served as a cargo handler aboard a spice freighter.
Spice freighters were first mentioned in the 1977 saga film Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
